attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At the moment, everyone over 60s receives a heating allowance. It should be means tested as multi millionaires receive it as well! I think people over £15,000 in savings shouldn't receive the payment. If means tested, the govt will have enough money to give to those on disability allowances.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
